title: A Simple Cross Network, OS and Application Copy-Paste Written in Golang
author: nikajon_es
content: readme.md xcp cross application, network os copy-paste w/ web-browser viewusagexcp [<name>]-p <port>-v verbose -p specify port number, -v turn logging stdout. no <name> is specified, one automatically generated.start xcp one machine start another machine, copy paste the xcp commandline open browser on machine running xcp view contents a web browser.http://localhost:<port>/<name> multicast is setup things work across network, otherwise tcp host need be setup. second server need same port name connect directly. browser only used between or more connections.
